title: Hired Gun Graves Missing Part of His Gun

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Just picked up this sweet skin and turns out that he is missing part of his gun and when he ults the gun comes apart completely, please Riot fix this :(

replies.body:
Hey xXplebmastr69Xx -

Thanks for the report! In the future, please report bugs on the [Report A Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) section on the boards, as opposed to this one. Thanks! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=OGk483LZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-19T18:19:56.304+0000)
>
> Hey xXplebmastr69Xx -
> 
> Thanks for the report! In the future, please report bugs on the [Report A Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) section on the boards, as opposed to this one. Thanks! :D

its not a bug, its just a really awkward skin defect. Its been there since the release of hired gun graves, so id assume it was well noted.
Defects would be considered bugs. This isn't intended behavior, so it would be classified as a bug.
